name: Bose 251 Environmental Speakers - Pair (White)

overviewFields.title: Bose 251 Environmental Speakers
overviewFields.value: A combination of advanced technology, extensive research and rigorous testing, Bose 251 speakers set a new standard for performance and reliability outdoors. An Articulated Array speaker design reproduces sound over a larger listening area. The result is a wide distribution of sound, so you can enjoy music equally from both speakers as you move around outdoors. And the patented multi-chamber enclosure helps reproduce music’s lower reaches with exceptional fullness and depth, without audible distortion, from a small design. Weather-resistant mounting brackets and hardware are also included to allow for easy installation. And it’s all backed by a 5-year transferable warranty.

overviewFields.title: Bose 251 Environmental Speakers Features:
overviewFields.value: The best Bose environmental speakers for performance and reliability., Articulated Array speaker design reproduces sound over a larger listening area., Patented multi-chamber enclosure for deep, rich lower notes without audible distortion., Withstand nature’s harsh elements., Five-year transferable warranty – one of the strongest in the business., Weather-resistant brackets and hardware included for easy installation., Engineered and tested to withstand snow, rain, salt and temperature extremes of 158°F (70°C) to -40°F (-40°C)., Survived Salt Fog test 66% longer than the demanding Marine Industry Standard., Driver complement: One 51⁄4" (13.3 cm) woofer in a multi-chamber bass enclosure; two 21⁄2" (6.4 cm) TwiddlerTM drivers in an, Articulated Array speaker design., Compatible with receivers or amplifiers rated from 10 to 200 watts per channel/rated 4 to 8 ohms., Dimensions: 131⁄2"H x 53⁄4"W x 8"D (34.3 x 14.6 x 20.3 cm).

name: Bowers & Wilkins AM-1 2-Way Weatherproof Indoor/Outdoor Speaker - Pair (White)

overviewFields.title: Performance That Endures
overviewFields.value: AM-1 is entirely sealed, in order to keep the elements at bay. It’s tough and hard-wearing too, and its clever one-piece mounting system with 220-degree rotation means it’s ready to perform wherever you want it to, come rain or shine.

overviewFields.title: Easy To Install, Great To Listen To
overviewFields.value: A one-plug, simple-to-install mounting system means AM-1 is happy vertically or horizontally. Plus, smart engineering means AM-1 sounds great whichever way you choose to mount it.

overviewFields.title: Specified And Built Without Compromise
overviewFields.value: With our trademark Nautilus tube-loaded 25mm aluminum dome tweeter and 130mm glassfiber mid/bass driver supplemented by an auxiliary bass radiator for solid, powerful bass response, AM-1 has sound and scale way beyond its compact dimensions.

overviewFields.title: Acoustically Optimized Cabinet
overviewFields.value: A highly rigid, tuned, aircraft-grade aluminum enclosure ensures the truest sound, uncolored by cabinet resonances, for pristine sonic reproduction.

overviewFields.title: IP66-Rated Weather Protection
overviewFields.value: Water and dust-resistant construction means you can enjoy stunning home theater sound and high-resolution music outdoors.

overviewFields.title: Multi-Driver Arrays
overviewFields.value: Mythos LCR on-wall speakers feature 2- and 3-way driver arrays. Multiple-driver arrays improve driver performance and project robust, full-range sound over a wide area.

overviewFields.title: XTDD Drivers
overviewFields.value: Ultra-stiff, 3.5” anodized aluminum dome woofers and midrange drivers eliminate breakup and broaden dispersion, for crisp, clear sound and a spacious, enveloping soundstage.

overviewFields.title: Aluminum Oxide Dome Tweeter
overviewFields.value: A 1”, rigid, well-damped Dymension™ Series tweeter delivers smooth extended response, crisp transients, and pinpoint imaging, for cohesive, lifelike sound that draws you inside the action.

overviewFields.title: Timbre-Matched
overviewFields.value: Consistent sound across Definitive Technology speakers gives you the flexibility to mix and match speakers to build the ultimate system or a starter system that can expand as your needs grow.

overviewFields.title: Built for the Outdoors
overviewFields.value: Uniquely designed for outdoor patios and entertaining areas, the Furrion Aurora Full-Sun Pro Series 4K UHD LED outdoor smart TV takes the entertainment outdoors! This outdoor television features a weatherproof TV housing that protects the internal components and delivers IP66-rated protection. The screen delivers a stunningly clear picture at 2,500-nit brightness and features HDR10+ for vivid colors and deep, rich contrast. It also features an XtremeShield IK09-rated impact-resistant screen to protect against impacts and scratches and is rated to withstand extreme operating temperatures from -24° to 140°F (-31°C to 60°C) and storage humidity of 0% to 90%.

overviewFields.value: Watch the morning news, the big game, or a movie outside! The stunningly rich picture of this commercial grade TV gives you optimal viewing in sunny areas, such as an exposed patio, deck or yard. The 4K ultra-high-definition (UHD) screen delivers an ultra-bright, crystal-clear picture and a better viewing experience at four times the resolution of full HD.

overviewFields.title: Weatherproof Housing
overviewFields.value: With a weatherproof housing and IP66 rating, the Furrion Aurora Full-Sun Pro Series 4K UHD LED outdoor smart TV is engineered to withstand the harsh effects of UV rays, rain, snow, dirt, dust, insects and humidity. The screen features XtremeShield IK09-rated impact resistance to protect against impacts scratches. This commercial TV can withstand extreme operating temperatures from -24° to 140°F (-31°C to 60°C) and storage humidity of 0% to 90%.

overviewFields.title: Integrated Smart Technology

Watch TV shows, sports and movies from the streaming service of your choice using the integrated WiFi capabilities – no additional streaming devices required! All you need is a WiFi signal. The Aurora outdoor weatherproof TV also features RangeXtend antenna for a boosted signal when your router is set up away from your TV.

overviewFields.title: The New Shape of High-Performance Sound
overviewFields.value: With MODEL M1, high performance meets elegant proportions and intuitive design. Born from decades of Marantz heritage and engineering expertise, this new generation of wireless streaming amplifier transforms the way you listen to music and watch TV throughout your home with its great sound and range of comprehensive smart features.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 2.1 Channel output

overviewFields.value: Digital decoding with Dolby Digital+

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Effortless streaming with HEOS® Built-in, Wi-Fi, Airplay 2, Spotify Connect*

overviewFields.title: Marantz Musical Digital Filtering
overviewFields.value: Marantz is recognized for sound quality that celebrates the natural warmth, detail, and spaciousness found in the best-quality recordings. Marantz Musical Digital Filtering (MMDF) ensures those analog-like characteristics are preserved, even with digital music playback. These unique oversampling digital filtering techniques, first developed for Marantz reference-grade audiophile products, are instrumental in delivering the MODEL M1’s musical and engaging sound.

overviewFields.title: TV Sound: Marantz Quality, Soundbar Simplicity
overviewFields.value: MODEL M1 radically improves your TV viewing experience. Its compact design is small enough to sit unobtrusively on or in furniture. Thanks to its eARC HDMI connector and onboard Dolby Digital+ decoding, it delivers effortless usability and high-quality sound from your favorite TV shows and movies. Plus, a wide range of useful audio adjustments provides an optimized listening experience, whatever and whenever you are watching. Your TV remote will even control MODEL M1’s volume.

overviewFields.title: Stylish Industrial Design
overviewFields.value: MODEL M1 is engineered to work everywhere. Its smart design has a soft-touch finish and a distinctive metal grille on top to appear subtly elegant when placed in view. Yet it's compact enough that it can be placed anywhere, either on-show or hidden out of sight. Capacitive touch buttons and dimmable LED declutter the front panel leaving essential controls and status indication easily available.

overviewFields.title: Custom-Install Ready
overviewFields.value: MODEL M1 is the ideal solution for an elegant, effortless multi-room system. Two MODEL M1s can be installed side-by-side within a rack, while its highly effective thermal management means no intrusive fan noise or issues with heat build-up in cabinets. If space is at a premium, MODEL M1 can be strategically mounted via a threaded mounting point on the bottom of the amplifier.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 4 1/2-inch (11.43cm) long-throw mineral-filled polypropylene cone driver with butyl rubber surround pumps out surprising bass response from a compact design.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 3/4-inch (19mm) anodized aluminum dome tweeter with neodymium magnet for better power handling and smoother response.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Broad coverage baffle designed, adapted and applied from our current Atrium design but with subtle improvements in the new Atrium Series. You want to fill a large open outdoor space with big, full-range sound, The new Atrium Series has a more steeply-angled baffle design that maximizes critical mid- and high-frequency dispersion over a large area, without sacrificing the detail.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Polk all-weather certified, Atrium Series speakers exceed baseline industrial and military specifications for environmental endurance (ASTM D5894-UV Salt Fog, Mil Standard 810 Immersion, Mil-Std 883 Method 1009.8 for salt and corrosion.) Certification means Atrium speakers can effortlessly withstand the worst Mother Nature can dish out, whether its extreme temps or heavy rains. With certification like this, your kitchen or bathroom installation is a cakewalk for Polk all-weather speakers.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Speed-Lock mounting system, for easy, safe one-handed installations even in difficult locations. The greatly simplified mounting procedure means fewer parts to juggle. Simply mount the bracket and click the speaker into place. Aim it and tighten it down, and fini! Outdoor convenience, indoor sound quality!

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Durable, mineral-filled polypropylene cabinet design, with molded-in bracing, sounds like a real speaker (not an outdoor speaker), and survives years of seasonal changes, for truly great sound, no matter what the weather.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Patented Dynamic Balance and Klippel optimization technologies ensure the perfect material performance, eliminating driver and tweeter artifacts for more realistic sound reproduction at high and low volume levels.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Aluminum grilles and bracket, with stainless steel and brass hardware: No rust. Ever.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Gold-plated 5-way binding posts for the most secure, dependable hookups.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: All Polk products are made using the best materials and the most advanced manufacturing techniques. They pass the industry's most exhaustive quality tests, including drop testing, extreme signal response and UV & salt exposure testing. Polk loudspeakers are built to perform for a lifetime.

overviewFields.title: Quantum Matrix with Mini LEDs
overviewFields.value: Catch every detail in dark to bright scenes. Precise lighting from Mini LEDs boost brightness so you don't miss a thing.

overviewFields.title: IP56 Rated for Durability
overviewFields.value: Have peace of mind—even outside. The Terrace is uniquely designed to be durable, earning an IP56 rating—an international system that measures outdoor electronics protection against dust and water. Enjoy year-round entertainment with this outdoor TV that’s been tested for optimum durability.

overviewFields.title: A Speedy Processor
overviewFields.value: The power behind the 4K picture that actively improves the quality. The NQ4 AI Gen2 Processor keepings everything running, using 20 specialized networks to drive the intuitive Smart TV Hub, Dolby Atmos™ sound, and expertly upscaled 4K resolution.

overviewFields.title: 4K AI Upscaling
overviewFields.value: Get sharper detail and enhanced clarity when watching lower-resolution content.² Whether you're streaming an HD movie or watching live sports, our high-performance, AI-powered processor automatically upgrades your content scene by scene.

overviewFields.title: Anti-Reflection with Wide Viewing Angle
overviewFields.value: Whatever you do, you’ll get a great view. The Terrace has anti-reflection tech to limit light distraction and reduce glare. See your TV's clarity and contrast even when you’re out and about in your favorite shaded outdoor space.

overviewFields.title: Samsung Tizen OS
overviewFields.value: Stream your favorite shows. Play games. Work out with a trainer. Do all you enjoy with Smart TV Powered by Tizen. Discover your must-have apps and streaming services all just a few clicks away.

name: Bowers & Wilkins ASW 610XP 10" Subwoofer (White)

overviewFields.title: Boost Your Bass
overviewFields.value: The new 600 Series from Bowers & Wilkins transforms your home with pristine sound. Since 1966, Bowers & Wilkins has made technological advances to design the perfect loudspeaker, and their latest innovations bring that heritage to music and movie lovers alike. The 600 Series includes three subwoofers, ranging from the compact ASW608 to the powerful ASW610XP. Each boasts an audiophile-standard, highly efficient Class D amplifier to capture every spine-tingling, water-shaking sound that you hear. Each of our subwoofers are finished to match the rest of the series, with beautiful matte black and white to seamlessly integrate with your home. With the sixth generation of the 600 Series, you can truly transform your space into a beautiful sound session.

name: Definitive Technology Descend DN8 8" Subwoofer (White)

overviewFields.title: Designed to play loud & clear. Sized to fit anywhere.
overviewFields.value: Sized to fit anywhere, the DN8 performs bigger, louder, and clearer than other 8” subwoofers. Its unique 3XR™ Architecture creates three times the radiating surface area of similarly sized subs, providing more bass. And because it uses passive bass radiators, you get that big, thrilling bass with no port noise distortion.

overviewFields.title: 3XR Architecture for Loud & Clear Bass
overviewFields.value: Descend Series subwoofers feature Definitive Technology’s new 3XR™ Architecture, providing three times the bass-producing radiating surface area of a traditional ported subwoofer. This extra surface area moves more air, resulting in massive bass. And because 3XR doesn’t use ports, it also provides crystal-clear lows with no port noise distortion.

overviewFields.title: Fits Nearly Everywhere
overviewFields.value: The DN8 is just over one foot wide, enabling it to fit virtually any room or system. And due to its 3XR™ Architecture, it performs like a 10” subwoofer even though it has an 8” driver. With the DN8, you get tons of bass from a one-foot sub.

overviewFields.title: Custom Class D Digital Amplification
overviewFields.value: The DN8 is equipped with a 500W peak custom Class D digital amplifier, designed to get the most out of the DN8’s 3XR™ Architecture. This custom amplification gives the Descend DN8 enough power and efficiency to play as low as 35Hz.

overviewFields.title: Control & Customization
overviewFields.value: You can customize the DN8 to the needs of your own application, system, and space. The DN8 features built-in controls to dial in volume, low-pass filter, and phase (0/180°) for optimum bass levels. Set its power toggle to Auto on/off or DC control for fast and easy on/off power switching.

overviewFields.title: Connects to Any System
overviewFields.value: The DN8 delivers deep, dynamic bass to any home theater or music system. Easily connect it via LFE or stereo line-level RCA inputs (cables not included).

overviewFields.title: Pair Multiple Subwoofers for Optimal Performance
overviewFields.value: While a single subwoofer adds bass and enhanced realism to any system, it may not provide consistent frequency response throughout the room. Properly using multiple subwoofers designed to be used together like the DN8 flattens the frequency response. The result is smoother bass throughout the room, helping eliminate boomy locations or dead spots.

overviewFields.title: Three Decades of Thrilled Customers
overviewFields.value: Definitive Technology has been thrilling movie and music enthusiasts for decades with high-performance, high-value subwoofers that consistently deliver deep, impactful, dynamic bass to home theater and music systems.

overviewFields.title: Limited Warranty, Built to Last
overviewFields.value: Manufactured under the strictest quality controls, Definitive Technology speakers and subwoofers are built for the long haul. All Definitive Technology products come with a limited warranty (1 year on amplifier, 2 years on driver).

overviewFields.title: 12” Polycellulose Ribbed Cone Low-Frequency Woofer
overviewFields.value: Each speaker in the Stage 2 series features Polycellulose ribbed cone woofers. This pure pulp cone has a proprietary mix of other materials added to improve its rigidity and the ribs echo legendary JBL designs. These woofers produce deep, accurate, room filling bass.

overviewFields.title: 300-Watts RMS Amplifier
overviewFields.value: The built-in high-performance 500-watt amplifier provides impactful and memorable sound quality deserving of the JBL name. The 220P can be placed anywhere in the room and connects to your AVR to create a stereo or multi-channel home theater system with impactful bass and unprecedented performance.

overviewFields.title: Bass-Reflex Design with Dual Rear-Firing Flared Ports
overviewFields.value: The Bass-Reflex design of the 220P use dual rear-firing flared ports. This new flared design reduces the velocity of the air when exiting the speaker cabinet, eliminating any chuffing or coloration of output.

overviewFields.title: 10” Polycellulose Ribbed Cone Low-Frequency Woofer
overviewFields.value: Each speaker in the Stage 2 series features Polycellulose ribbed cone woofers. This pure pulp cone has a proprietary mix of other materials added to improve its rigidity and the ribs echo legendary JBL designs. These woofers produce deep, accurate, room filling bass.

overviewFields.title: 150-Watts RMS Amplifier
overviewFields.value: The built-in high-performance 300-watt amplifier provides impactful and memorable sound quality deserving of the JBL name. The 200P can be placed anywhere in the room and connects to your AVR to create a stereo or multi-channel home theater system with impactful bass and unprecedented performance.

overviewFields.title: Dual Rear-Firing Flared Ports
overviewFields.value: The Bass-Reflex design of the 200P use dual rear- firing flared ports. This new flared design reduces the velocity of the air when exiting the speaker cabinet, eliminating any chuffing or coloration of output.

overviewFields.title: Rear Mounted Controls
overviewFields.value: The rear mounted controls include a variable low-pass 50-150Hz crossover, so it can be dialed in precisely under the main channels and the power can remain on or be set to Auto to save energy.

overviewFields.title: Line-Level LFE Input
overviewFields.value: The 200P profiles complete integration with and audio system via Line Level or LFE inputs. The LFE input bypasses the subwoofer's internal low-pass crossover. It is used when you're connecting the subwoofer to the dedicated subwoofer output of a receiver/processor that has its own low-pass crossover network.

overviewFields.title: Magnetically Attached Grilles
overviewFields.value: Stage 2 has premium details throughout the line including magnetically attached grilles, unique trim rings and the floating front baffle design upscale features not typically found on loudspeakers in this price range.

overviewFields.title: Adjustable Floor Spikes
overviewFields.value: The floor spikes on the 200P provide stability when placing your speakers on a thick rug or plush carpeting. The carpet spikes can be manually screwed into each foot on the plinth of the speaker and are easily adjustable from the top.

overviewFields.title: Sealed Enclosure
overviewFields.value: Sealed subwoofers react to changes in audio more quickly than vented designs. Every bass note is reproduced accurately with little distortion allowing you to hear pure audio and not the subwoofers’ influence on the sound.

overviewFields.title: Durable Materials
overviewFields.value: All materials used are designed for years of worry-free longevity. Never worry about moving or placing items on sub8 as it can take the rigors of everyday life.

overviewFields.title: Compact Design
overviewFields.value: At roughly 11” in each direction, sub8 fits under desks or in the smallest of apartments where traditional home theatre subwoofers may dominate the space.

overviewFields.title: Stunning Looks
overviewFields.value: The simple, unfussy look of sub8 blends well into any decor and provides a cohesive look with Kanto speakers for unmatched aesthetics.

overviewFields.title: Easy Integration
overviewFields.value: The adjustable high-pass filter and phase switch lets you integrate sub8 into your audio system regardless of speakers being used ensuring you’re not leaving performance on the table

overviewFields.title: Pulse-Pounding Bass

overviewFields.title: Transform Your Home Theater Experience
overviewFields.value: Pair Sub 4 with Sonos Arc Ultra, Arc, or Beam for dramatically deeper bass and clearer highs that draw you deeper into movies, shows, and games.

overviewFields.title: Bring Your Music to Life
overviewFields.value: Hear the nuance in every note and enjoy a greater sense of spaciousness when you pair Sub 4 with Sonos Five, Era 300, or Era 100.

overviewFields.title: No Buzz or Rattle
overviewFields.value: The acoustic architecture creates a force-canceling effect that virtually eliminates distortion.

overviewFields.title: Perfectly Tuned for The Room
overviewFields.value: Trueplay™ optimizes the sound for the unique acoustics of the room and placement of your speakers.

overviewFields.title: Iconic Design
overviewFields.value: With its elegant sculptural shape and updated matte finish, Sub 4 is designed to look great in your home and to match your Sonos speakers.

overviewFields.title: Plug And Play
overviewFields.value: Simply plug in the power cable and open the Sonos app to add Sub 4 to your system.

overviewFields.title: Place It Where & How You Want
overviewFields.value: Sub 4 reliably connects to your Sonos soundbar or speaker over WiFi so you can place it anywhere in the room — even on its side and under your sofa.

overviewFields.title: Double The Drama
overviewFields.value: Pair two with Arc Ultra or Arc for bass so deep and sound so immersive, you'll forget you're at home and not in an actual theater.

overviewFields.title: Toned Down Impact
overviewFields.value: Sub 4 uses fewer materials and is more energy efficient than previous generations.

overviewFields.title: Upgraded Technology
overviewFields.value: With increased processing power, memory, and new WiFi radios, Sub 4 is the most advanced Sonos subwoofer to date.

overviewFields.title: Superb Sonic Power
overviewFields.value: Next-gen acoustics bring your music to life with detailed stereo separation and deep bass at any volume.

overviewFields.title: Minor scale for major versatility
overviewFields.value: Place this speaker anywhere and everywhere you want to listen. The compact design fits beautifully on your bookshelf, kitchen counter, desk, or nightstand.

overviewFields.title: Play From Any Service or Device
overviewFields.value: Stream the highest-quality audio from anywhere in your home without interruptions from calls or notifications.

overviewFields.title: Breeze Through Setup
overviewFields.value: Go from unboxing to unbelievable sound in just a few minutes. Simply plug in the power cable, connect your phone or tablet to WiFi, and open the Sonos app.

overviewFields.title: Music Comes Standard
overviewFields.value: Discover free music, original content, and thousands of live stations from around the world on Sonos Radio. Find it in the Sonos app as soon as you set up your system.

overviewFields.title: Tunes Itself For You
overviewFields.value: With a tap in the Sonos app, Trueplay™ tuning technology analyzes the unique acoustics of your space and optimizes the speaker’s EQ. So all your content sounds just the way it should.

overviewFields.title: Surround Yourself In Superior Stereo
overviewFields.value: Experience an even wider soundstage and awe-inspiring sweet spot when you pair two speakers in the same room.5

overviewFields.title: Control Your Way
overviewFields.value: Intuitive touch controls provide quick, screen-free control. Just tap or swipe to play, pause, adjust the volume, and group your Sonos speakers.

overviewFields.title: Your Voice, Your Choice
overviewFields.value: Era 100 is designed for ease of listening and mind, with multiple ways to protect your privacy.

overviewFields.title: Customize Your Sound System
overviewFields.value: Mix and match products that fit all the places and ways you want to listen. Pair identical speakers for richer stereo sound, build a surround sound system for home theater, and feel even more immersed when you add Sonos to every room.

overviewFields.title: Can I use Bluetooth as soon as I plug in the speaker?
overviewFields.value: Era 100 must first be set up on WiFi using the Sonos app. Following setup, you can easily pair a Bluetooth device by pressing the button on the back of the speaker. Please note that if you use a pair as rear speakers for home theater surround sound, Bluetooth will be disabled.

overviewFields.title: Where should I place Era 100?
overviewFields.value: Designed for versatility, Era 100 fits almost anywhere, including enclosed spaces such as a bookshelf. It’s also humidity resistant, so you can place it in the kitchen or on a covered patio.

overviewFields.title: Does Era 100 support stereo pairing?
overviewFields.value: Yes. For an even wider soundstage, you can stereo pair two Era 100 speakers in the same room. These can also be used as rear speakers for surround sound with Arc, Beam (any generation), or Ray. Era 100 will not pair with Sonos One, One SL, or Play:1.

overviewFields.title: Which soundbars can I use with Era 100 for surround sound?
overviewFields.value: Pair two Era 100 speakers with Arc, Beam (any generation), or Ray for surround sound. Era 100 is not compatible with Playbar or Playbase.

overviewFields.title: How do I use Trueplay™ to tune Era 100?
overviewFields.value: The Trueplay tuning experience differs slightly for Android and iOS. With an Android device, Trueplay relies on the microphones of the speaker. With an iOS device, you have the option to use this Trueplay method  (referred to as Quick Tuning in the Sonos app) or the traditional method (referred to as Advanced Tuning) which uses the microphones in your iPhone or iPad and requires you to move around the room. Please note that if you use a pair of Era 100 speakers for surround sound with your Sonos soundbar, Trueplay will require a supported iOS device.

overviewFields.title: Which subwoofer should I pair with Era 100?
overviewFields.value: We recommend pairing Era 100 with Sub Mini or Sub. All generations of Sub are compatible.

overviewFields.title: Can I experience Dolby Atmos with Era 100?
overviewFields.value: The acoustic architecture of Era 100 does not support playback of spatial audio content.

overviewFields.title: How can I use line in?
overviewFields.value: To connect an audio device directly to Era 100, you need to use the Sonos Line-In Adapter and a 3.5 mm auxiliary cable, both sold separately.

overviewFields.title: What's the difference between Bluetooth and WiFi?
overviewFields.value: A WiFi connection provides the best listening experience, allowing you to stream lossless audio from anywhere in your home. Bluetooth allows you to quickly connect a phone, tablet, or laptop to your speaker and stream compressed audio directly from the paired device — without the Sonos app but within a limited range.

overviewFields.title: Can I use Bluetooth with a stereo pair?
overviewFields.value: If you have created a stereo pair, you can still stream audio using Bluetooth. Please note that if you use a pair of speakers for home theater surround sound, Bluetooth and Line-In will be disabled.

overviewFields.title: Can I group speakers while using Bluetooth?
overviewFields.value: Yes. Similar to the experience with Sonos Roam and Move, if you are playing content from a Bluetooth source, you can group Era 100 with other products in your Sonos system that are connected to WiFi.

overviewFields.title: Can I use a third-party adapter for line in?
overviewFields.value: No. Most, if not all, of the USB-C to 3.5 mm adapters on the market today are intended for line out (headphones) and do not.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: No matter where you are or what you play, the listening experience is nothing short of extraordinary. Custom waveguides disperse sound right, left, forward, and above, creating a sensationally spacious stereo soundstage you can enjoy all around the room.

overviewFields.title: Take your spatial audio experience above and beyond
overviewFields.value: Featuring six optimally positioned drivers all around the front, sides, and top to support Dolby Atmos Music, the breakthrough acoustic design projects sound from wall to wall and floor to ceiling, immersing you in every dimension of the song.<sup>7</sup>

overviewFields.title: Make the whole room the sweet spot
overviewFields.value: No matter where you are or what you play, the listening experience is nothing short of extraordinary. Custom waveguides disperse sound right, left, forward, and above, creating a sensationally spacious stereo soundstage you can feel all around the room.

overviewFields.title: An acoustic and aesthetic masterpiece
overviewFields.value: The first-of-its-kind design exquisitely balances sonic performance and visual appeal, precisely angling each driver while looking worthy of display.

overviewFields.title: Play from any service or device
overviewFields.value: Stream the highest-quality audio from anywhere in your home without interruptions from calls or notifications.

overviewFields.title: Surround sound so real it's surreal
overviewFields.value: Experience mind-bending surround sound when you pair two speakers with Sonos Arc or Beam (Gen 2). Supercharged by Dolby Atmos, the lateral and overhead channels in each product create an all-encompassing soundstage.<sup>8</sup>

overviewFields.title: Bewilderingly easy to set up
overviewFields.value: Go from unboxing to unbelievable sound in just a few minutes. Simply plug in the power cable, connect your phone or tablet to WiFi, and open the Sonos app.

overviewFields.title: Perfectly tuned for the room
overviewFields.value: With a tap in the Sonos app, Trueplay™ tuning technology analyzes the unique acoustics of your space and optimizes the speaker’s EQ. So all your content sounds just the way it should.

overviewFields.title: Music comes standard
overviewFields.value: Discover free music, original content, and thousands of live stations from around the world on Sonos Radio. Find it in the Sonos app as soon as you set up your system.

overviewFields.title: Your voice, your choice
overviewFields.value: Era 300 is designed for ease of listening and mind, with multiple ways to protect your privacy.

overviewFields.title: Customize your sound system
overviewFields.value: Mix and match products that fit all the places and ways you want to listen. Pair identical speakers for richer stereo sound, build a surround sound system for home theater, and feel even more immersed when you add Sonos to every room.

overviewFields.title: Where should I place Era 300?
overviewFields.value: For optimal sound quality, Era 300 should be placed indoors and have approximately two feet of overhead clearance. Placement in an enclosed space such as a bookshelf is not recommended as this could impact dispersion and playback clarity.

overviewFields.title: Does Era 300 support stereo pairing?
overviewFields.value: Yes. For an even wider soundstage and more depth, pair two Era 300 speakers in the same room. These can also be used as rear speakers for multichannel surround sound with Arc or Beam (Gen 2).

overviewFields.title: What soundbars will pair with Era 300 for surround sound?
overviewFields.value: Because Era 300 is a multichannel rear speaker, it requires a Sonos soundbar that supports Dolby Atmos, i.e. Arc or Beam (Gen 2). For this reason, Era 300 is not compatible with Playbar, Playbase, Beam (Gen 1), or Ray.

overviewFields.title: Which subwoofer should I pair with Era 300?
overviewFields.value: Era 300 has great bass on its own.  For a richer, more powerful sound experience, we recommend pairing Era 300 with Sub (any generation).

overviewFields.title: What is spatial audio?
overviewFields.value: While audio mixed in stereo is limited to left and right channels with elements localized within a horizontal plane, spatial audio technologies, such as Dolby Atmos, allow creators to place individual sounds all around you in 3D space for a more immersive and realistic listening experience. When you enjoy spatial audio content on Era 300, the speaker receives the audio signal and re-creates the immersive sound field in your home.

overviewFields.title: How can I experience spatial audio on Era 300?
overviewFields.value: To experience music in spatial audio, you’ll need to be connected to WiFi and streaming Dolby Atmos Music from a supported service. Refer to https://support.sonos.com/article/listen-to-dolby-atmos-music-on-sonos for more information.

overviewFields.title: Can I use Bluetooth® as soon as I plug in the speaker?
overviewFields.value: Era 300 must first be set up on WiFi using the Sonos app. Following setup, you can easily pair a Bluetooth device by pressing the button on the back of the speaker. Please note that if you use a pair as rear speakers for home theater surround sound, Bluetooth will be disabled.

overviewFields.title: What's the difference between Bluetooth and WiFi?
overviewFields.value: A WiFi connection provides the best listening experience, allowing you to stream lossless and spatial audio from anywhere in your home. Bluetooth allows you to quickly connect a phone, tablet, or laptop to your speaker and stream audio directly from the paired device — without the Sonos app but within a limited range.

overviewFields.title: Can I use Bluetooth with a stereo pair?
overviewFields.value: If you have created a stereo pair, you can still stream audio using Bluetooth. Please note that if you use a pair of speakers for home theater surround sound, Bluetooth and Line-In will be disabled.

overviewFields.title: Can I group speakers while using Bluetooth?
overviewFields.value: Yes. Similar to the experience with Sonos Roam and Move, if you are playing content from a Bluetooth source, you can group Era 300 with other products in your Sonos system that are connected to WiFi.

overviewFields.title: How can I use line in?
overviewFields.value: To connect an audio device directly to Era 300, you need to use the Sonos Line-In Adapter and a 3.5 mm auxiliary cable, both sold separately.

overviewFields.title: How do I connect my turntable to Sonos?
overviewFields.value: You can connect your turntable to Era 300 using the Sonos Line-In Adapter and an auxiliary cable.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: WWSS4E3BLK

overviewFields.title: Reference subwoofer performance just went micro.
overviewFields.value: Chest-pounding, musical bass with deep low-frequency extension, from a shockingly compact 10-inch cabinet. Many micro subwoofers have tried, all have failed. Until now. The miniature yet mighty SVS 3000 Micro subwoofer seamlessly blends into any room and speaker system, energizing space with astonishingly rich, effortless, and detailed bass for music and home theater that’s all the more impressive given its micro-sized enclosure.

overviewFields.title: Fully-Active Dual-Opposing 8-inch Drivers – Defy the Laws of Physics with Room-Shaking Output with Pinpoint Accuracy
overviewFields.value: A first-ever design for SVS, two fully active 8-inch woofers are mounted on opposite sides of the sealed cabinet and move in perfect unison to generate stunning low-frequency output with crisp, musical transients. The usable surface area of two fully-active 8-inch woofers firing in opposite directions achieves performance on par with significantly larger single-driver subwoofers. Its tight, punchy output obliterates multi-driver passive radiator subwoofer designs known for their bloated and boomy sound.

overviewFields.title: Innovative Motor Assembly - Maximizes Current Delivery for Dual-Driver Array
overviewFields.value: An oversized, vented motor structure is optimized for efficient thermal and mechanical-energy management in a confined space. The massive electromagnetic force produced by the motor, in symphony with the high current driving power of the Sledge amplifier, allows the 3000 Micro to maximize the output potential of the dual drivers.

overviewFields.title: Sledge STA-800D2 Amplifier – Massive Output with Precise Driver Control
overviewFields.value: A driver is only potential and requires an equally potent amplifier. Extreme challenges existed for SVS engineers when designing an amplifier capable of powering fully-active dual 8-inch drivers at reference levels in a micro-sized cabinet. How to maximize SPLs while maintaining accuracy? How to optimize the potential of room gain? How to maintain proper cooling while achieving massive SPLs?

overviewFields.title: Sophisticated 50 MHz DSP Engine – Unrivaled Processing Power from a Home Audio Subwoofer
overviewFields.value: A 50 MHz Analog Devices DSP, normally reserved for high-end separate audio components, delivers sophisticated control and custom response curves optimized for real-world output and acoustically tuned room gain.

overviewFields.title: 3000 Micro Smartphone App – Easiest Way Ever to Manage Subwoofer DSP and Control
overviewFields.value: The most convenient way ever to control volume, access multiple DSP functions, and program custom preset tuning profiles optimized for music, movies, gaming, and more. All accessible with a single touch. Adjust crossover frequencies, a three-band parametric EQ, polarity, room gain, and more, all from your favorite seat.

overviewFields.title: Rear Panel Intelligent Control Interface (ICI)
overviewFields.value: Rear-panel SVS Intelligent Control Interface (ICI) provides control options and connections for the subwoofer’s most critical functions.

overviewFields.title: Acoustically Inert and Rigidly Braced Sealed-Cabinet Design
overviewFields.value: Handsomely styled to complement the finest home theater and HiFi systems, yet compact enough to stash out of sight, the acoustically optimized 3000 Micro sealed cabinet design blends with any room or setup. Features extra-thick MDF front baffle and rigid internal bracing for a resonance-free environment that remains motionless even at peak playback levels, solving a long-time issue of “dancing” micro subwoofers. Serves as a blank canvas for uncompromised subwoofer performance.

overviewFields.title: Reference Subwoofer Performance Hits an All-Time Low.
overviewFields.value: Room-shaking low-frequency output well below the threshold of audibility where bass can be felt as well as heard, with pinpoint control and accuracy that obliterates any subwoofer in its class and beyond. Never has this level of subwoofer performance been available anywhere near the price.

overviewFields.title: Sledge STA-325D Amplifier – Effortless power with sophisticated control
overviewFields.value: The Sledge STA-325D amplifier maximizes the full potential of the 12-inch driver with effortless power and precise control. The innovative design combines the efficiency of a Class D amplifier with the ability to move colossal amounts of current through the fully discrete MOSFETs for outstanding real-world subwoofer performance at all drive levels, in any room. Allows easy integration with any home theater or stereo speaker system.

Adjust crossover frequencies, dial-in the three-band parametric EQ, polarity, room gain, and more, all from your favorite seat.

overviewFields.title: Reference Subwoofer Performance Hits New Lows. Again
overviewFields.value: 2000 Pro models replace the most popular SVS subwoofers of all time, and since we don’t believe in anything less than a complete reimagining, they represent a massive performance upgrade over the original 2000 Series in every way. Jaw-dropping deep bass extension and massive output with stunning musicality that will delight both audiophiles and home theater fans. Reference subwoofer performance has never been available near this price from a cabinet of this size, ever.

overviewFields.title: Breathtaking Output and Deep Bass Extension with Pinpoint Control and Accuracy
overviewFields.value: Featuring technology from the flagship SVS 16-Ultra Series, winners of nearly every industry and media award as the top subwoofers worldwide, the SB-2000 Pro unleashes breathtaking output and extension without ever sacrificing driver control or accuracy in frequency response. The sealed cabinet design combines the most sophisticated SVS subwoofer technology ever developed with trailblazing innovations to set a new standard for subwoofer performance based on price and cabinet size.

overviewFields.title: All New 12-inch High-Excursion SVS Driver – Sonic Sledgehammer with Finesse
overviewFields.value: Completely redesigned 12-inch SVS driver delivers massive low frequency output with unerring accuracy and transient speed. An aluminum vented cone with exceptional stiffness to mass ratio and a proprietary injection molded extreme-excursion surround ensure flawless pistonic motion for pinpoint control and accuracy.

overviewFields.title: Sledge STA-550D Amplifier – Effortless Power and Absolute Command
overviewFields.value: The Sledge STA-550D amplifier maximizes the full potential of the 12-inch driver with effortless power and precise control. name: Kanto ORA Powered Reference Desktop Speakers with Bluetooth - Pair (Black)

overviewFields.title: Everything A Desktop Speaker Should Be
overviewFields.value: Creator. Gamer. Musician. No matter how you define yourself, you deserve defined sound. ORA bridges the gap between computer speakers and studio monitors giving you studio-grade, audiophile-approved sound without dominating your space. ORA has modern inputs like USB-C to get the best sound from your PC or Mac, Bluetooth ® 5.0 to pair with your phone or smart home device, and RCA for your analog gear. Sporting a crossover that automatically sends bass to a connected subwoofer, you get flawless low-end integration freeing up the 3” woofers and ¾” silk dome tweeters to focus on what they do best. ORA is the perfect blend of reference-quality sound and modern features at a compact size to fit on your desktop.

overviewFields.title: Reference Quality
overviewFields.value: 100W of DSP-tuned, bi-amplified Class-D power for near studio-grade sound with shockingly deep bass from its 3” woofers. Linear enough to pull double duty as a studio monitor and a multimedia speaker.

overviewFields.title: Plug ‘N Play
overviewFields.value: ORA desktop speakers feature three inputs covering your digital and analog needs. USB-C to get the best sound from your PC or Mac, Bluetooth 5.0 pairs seamlessly with your phone or smart home device, and RCA for your analog gear.

overviewFields.title: Seamless Sub Integration
overviewFields.value: A crossover network kicks in automatically when a sub is connected letting ORA focus on vocals and high frequencies. By relieving ORA of sub-bass duties, you can play louder with less distortion.

overviewFields.title: Compact Size
overviewFields.value: Coming in at a fraction of the size of full-size bookshelf speakers, ORA is small enough to place sideways under a monitor or toss into a backpack for an impromptu recording session.

overviewFields.title: Retro Friendly
overviewFields.value: With magnetically shielded drivers, there’s no fear of placing ORA directly beside your CRT or high-end PVM. Hear every square wave and sawtooth in stunning detail from the analog RCA input.

overviewFields.title: Rear Mountable
overviewFields.value: A 1/4”-20 threaded insert located at the rear of each speaker lets you wall, or ceiling mount ORA with any compatible speaker mounting bracket.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: ORAMB

overviewFields.value: A crossover network kicks in automatically when a sub is connected letting ORA focus on vocals and high frequencies. By relieving ORA of sub-bass duties, you can play louder with less distortion.

overviewFields.title: Compact Size
overviewFields.value: Coming in at a fraction of the size of full-size bookshelf speakers, ORA is small enough to place sideways under a monitor or toss into a backpack for an impromptu recording session.

overviewFields.title: Retro Friendly
overviewFields.value: With magnetically shielded drivers, there’s no fear of placing ORA directly beside your CRT or high-end PVM. Hear every square wave and sawtooth in stunning detail from the analog RCA input.

overviewFields.title: Rear Mountable
overviewFields.value: A 1/4”-20 threaded insert located at the rear of each speaker lets you wall, or ceiling mount ORA with any compatible speaker mounting bracket.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: ORAMG

name: Kanto ORA Powered Reference Desktop Speakers with Bluetooth (Pink)

overviewFields.title: Everything A Desktop Speaker Should Be
overviewFields.value: Creator. Gamer. Musician. No matter how you define yourself, you deserve defined sound. ORA bridges the gap between computer speakers and studio monitors giving you studio-grade, audiophile-approved sound without dominating your space. ORA has modern inputs like USB-C to get the best sound from your PC or Mac, Bluetooth ® 5.0 to pair with your phone or smart home device, and RCA for your analog gear. Sporting a crossover that automatically sends bass to a connected subwoofer, you get flawless low-end integration freeing up the 3” woofers and ¾” silk dome tweeters to focus on what they do best. ORA is the perfect blend of reference-quality sound and modern features at a compact size to fit on your desktop.

name: Kanto ORA4 Powered Bluetooth Desktop Speakers - Pair (Matte Black)

overviewFields.title: Pro Audio for The People
overviewFields.value: ORA4 takes the legacy of ORA to the next level by pushing bass extension even deeper while maintaining the same, great, reference-quality sound. Leaning further into the world of pro audio, ORA4 offers a flat, full-range frequency response to ensure mixes are dialed-in, and music sounds true-to-life. USB-C gives you a bit-perfect connection to your PC or Mac, Bluetooth 5.0 lets you wirelessly stream from a phone or smart home device, and RCA allows you to connect analog gear. When a subwoofer is plugged in, ORA4 automatically applies a high-pass filter to the 4” woofers keeping distortion at bay. ORA4 takes a no-nonsense approach to delivering studio-grade sound with modern features at a manageable size - perfect for nearly any scenario you throw it in.

overviewFields.title: Pro Sound
overviewFields.value: If your speakers aren’t neutral, you’re not hearing what the artist intended. Delivering 140 W of DSP tuned, bi-amplified Class-D power, ORA4 produces studio-grade sound with deep, authoritative bass from its 4” woofers. Accurate enough to work as a monitor and refined enough for HiFi use.

overviewFields.title: Jack Of All Trades
overviewFields.value: Equal parts bookshelf speaker, studio monitor, and computer speaker. ORA4 feels equally at home in virtually any scenario and is perfectly sized for any stand mount or desktop setup. Great sound in a compact package for gamers, creators, musicians, and audiophiles.

overviewFields.title: Modern Connections
overviewFields.value: To cover your digital and analog needs, ORA4 offers three inputs - USB-C for flawless sound from your PC or Mac, Bluetooth 5.0 for pairing with your phone or smart home device, and RCA for your analog gear. An endless amount of audio sources work with ORA4 from the past, present, or future.

overviewFields.title: Subwoofer Integration
overviewFields.value: You don’t have to sacrifice fidelity for low-end grunt. When a subwoofer is connected, a crossover network activates automatically, allowing ORA4 to concentrate on vocals and high frequencies. By offloading bass, ORA4 can play louder with less distortion improving overall sound quality.

overviewFields.title: Mounting Options
overviewFields.value: Two 1/4”-20 threaded inserts located at the rear, and bottom, of each speaker let you secure ORA4 to any compatible speaker mount or bracket. Whether you want to free up space by mounting them on a wall, or simply find the perfect spot in your room, you have the flexibility to place them wherever works best.

overviewFields.title: Pixel Perfect
overviewFields.value: Placing a magnet beside your tube TV is a sure-fire way to distort picture quality and lower its HP. ORA4’s woofers are magnetically shielded allowing you to place them beside your CRT or PVM without any worries. The RCA input gives you a direct connection to hear your favorite retro soundtracks in all their glory.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: ORA4MB

name: Kanto REN Powered Bluetooth Bookshelf Speakers - Pair (Matte Black)

overviewFields.title: The Simplicity of a Soundbar, the True Sound of Stereo.
overviewFields.value: Combining the simplicity of a soundbar with the accuracy of a DSP-controlled stereo system, REN seamlessly integrates with any modern TV via HDMI ARC, delivering a home theater-like experience in one streamlined package. REN tackles the frustration of quiet dialogue and overwhelming sound effects with two sound modes that boost vocals and reduce low frequencies for nighttime viewing. When it’s time to add a subwoofer, REN automatically filters sub-bass from its 5.25” aluminum woofers, letting them focus on midrange frequencies with minimal distortion. REN offers versatility beyond the living room with Bluetooth 5.3 for smart home devices, optical for WiFi network streamers, USB-C for desktop use, and analog inputs for everything else.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: HDMI ARC with CEC

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Wide Soundstage

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Vocal Boost

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Night Mode

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Subwoofer Output

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Flexible Compatibility

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Remote Included

overviewFields.title: Seamless TV Integration
overviewFields.value: Featuring HDMI ARC with CEC, REN offers the same kind of seamless TV integration that an AV receiver or soundbar provides. REN automatically wakes when the TV is turned on and can be controlled with the TV remote. No need for multiple remotes or bulky gear to get premium sound from your TV.

overviewFields.title: True Stereo Sound
overviewFields.value: Soundbars rarely extend past your TV and rely on digital processing to simulate a wider soundstage. You can place REN as far apart as you like giving you a true wide soundstage with pinpoint precision of where the action is happening on the screen. Achieve true stereo sound and leave the gimmicks behind.

overviewFields.title: Vocal Boost & Night Mode
overviewFields.value: REN is DSP-controlled, allowing for custom sound modes like Vocal Boost and Night Mode to improve quiet dialogue and soften loud sound effects when watching movies at night. Never miss a line of dialogue or accidentally wake up the neighbors again.

overviewFields.title: Bass Management
overviewFields.value: When a subwoofer is plugged into REN’s sub output, REN automatically sends all frequencies below 80 Hz to the subletting the speakers focus on what they do best while reducing distortion at higher volume levels. Expand your system when you’re ready and get even better sound.

overviewFields.title: Plug ‘N Play
overviewFields.value: REN has nearly every connection option available from USB-C for desktop use, Bluetooth 5.3 for mobile devices, optical for digital media, to RCA and AUX for analog gear. The connectivity and versatility to work with any piece of gear, in any scenario, past, present, or future.

overviewFields.title: Full Control
overviewFields.value: REN’s remote can swap the left and right channels, disable auto power-down, dim the front LED, mute an attached sub, control USB or Bluetooth playback, and adjust tone to dial in bass and treble.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: RENMB

specifications.title: HD and AAC Codecs USB DAC

overviewFields.title: TUK Premium Powered Speakers - Pair (Matte Black)
overviewFields.value: Delivering clarity and performance that put it in a class of its own, TUK is designed to push the limits on what a bookshelf speaker can achieve. Fine-tuned with onboard DSP, its high-performance AMT tweeters and 5.25” aluminum drivers produce sparkling highs and rich bass, bringing life to all your source material. Its active crossover further improves low-end resolution by filtering out sub-80Hz frequencies when connected to a subwoofer. Outfitted with dedicated phono, RCA, and Optical TOSLINK inputs, a built-in USB DAC and headphone amp, and Bluetooth 4.2 with aptX HD and AAC codecs, TUK provides the flexibility you need to enjoy all your devices.

name: Kanto YU2 Powered Desktop Speakers - Pair (Walnut)

overviewFields.title: Music is Made to Be Shared
overviewFields.value: Proudly designed in Canada, the YU2 desktop mini-monitor will make you believe that big sound can come in a small package. With its built-in soundcard, it can stream high-quality audio directly from your computer’s USB port, or connect directly to any 3.5mm AUX jack for maximum input flexibility. 3” composite drivers ensure a distortion-free bass and midrange, while the 3/4” silk dome tweeters effortlessly produce scintillating highs. A specially tuned bass-port on the rear extends the low end while keeping airflow away from your active workspace. If deep bass is your thing, simply connect a subwoofer to the SUB OUT port and revel in pure low-end bliss.

overviewFields.title: Silk Dome Tweeters
overviewFields.value: YU2 features 3/4” silk dome tweeters to deliver clear crisp highs.

overviewFields.title: Composite Drivers
overviewFields.value: The 3” composite drivers provide distortion-free mid-range and bass tones - surprising performance for such a small speaker.

overviewFields.title: Inputs and Outputs
overviewFields.value: Use the AUX input with the included Kanto 3.5mm cable to connect any device with a headphone jack to your YU2. Lighten the load on your computer’s CPU by connecting directly to YU2’s built-in DAC via a USB cable for a fully digital, high-quality audio connection. If you want a little more kick, connect a powered subwoofer to the SUB OUT port.

overviewFields.title: Rear Bass Port
overviewFields.value: YU2 has a rear bass port that has been carefully designed and tuned to eliminate port turbulence while extending bass response.

overviewFields.title: Knurled Binding Posts
overviewFields.value: The speaker connection from left to right uses high quality knurled binding posts. This standardized wiring system allows you to trim the included premium speaker wire to the desired length or purchase longer lengths for more versatility.

overviewFields.title: Accessible Volume Knob
overviewFields.value: Tucked neatly out of the way at the top of your active speaker, the smoothly rotating knob doubles as a power switch.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: YU2WALNUT

name: Kanto YU4 Powered Bookshelf Speakers with Built-In Bluetooth - Pair (Matte White)

overviewFields.title: Music is Made to be Shared
overviewFields.value: Whether you’re hanging out with friends or kicking it solo, YU4 ensures you’re always in good company. Producing 140W peak power, its Class D amplifier effortlessly fills your room with rich, spacious sound. Carefully designed 4” Kevlar drivers and 1” silk dome tweeters faithfully reproduce your favorite tunes, letting you enjoy them to their fullest. Packed with connectivity, YU4 makes it easy to throw on your latest vinyl with a built-in phono preamp, or sit back and stream your carefully curated playlist via Bluetooth. Crystal-clear, detailed sound for all to enjoy.

overviewFields.title: Remarkable Sound
overviewFields.value: Enclosed in handcrafted cabinets, YU4’s 1” silk dome tweeters and 4” Kevlar® drivers deliver crisp highs and wonderfully balanced mid-range, faithfully reproducing all your favorite tunes.

overviewFields.title: Bluetooth AptX
overviewFields.value: Built-in Bluetooth with Qualcomm aptXTM technology lets you enjoy high-quality streaming from the palm of your hand.

overviewFields.title: Phono Preamp
overviewFields.value: Equipped with an integrated phono preamp, YU4 can be easily connected to any vintage or modern day turntable.

overviewFields.title: Signal Detection
overviewFields.value: YU4 features automatic standby and power-up modes, helping to conserve power when you’re gone and ensuring you never miss a beat when the music starts playing.

Crystal-clear, detailed sound for all to enjoy.

overviewFields.title: SE6 Elevated Desktop Speaker Stands for Large Speakers - Pair
overviewFields.value: Take your sound game to the next level with the SE6 Elevated Speaker Stand. Standing at a height of 6.9", the SE6 boosts your speakers up and off the surface of your desk so that they’re better aligned with your ears to give you a flawless on-axis response. It's cantilevered and angled platform is designed to absorb resonance and deliver a pure sound without any reflections from nearby surfaces.

overviewFields.title: Features:
overviewFields.value: Elevated design for Large desktop or bookshelf speakers, Perfect for Kanto YU6’s, TUK, YU Passive 5.25” or similarly sized speakers, Built out of solid steel with a painted finish, Silicone pads to reduce vibration and provide grip, Mounting hole and 1/4”-20 screw allow for securing compatible speakers in place, Supports speakers weighing up to 22 lb (10 kg), Sold as a pair

overviewFields.title: Stellar Sound Quality
overviewFields.value: The SE6’s cantilevered design and 2.5mm silicone padding absorbs resonance from the speaker cabinet to produce a clean, distortion-free sound. Use the included mounting screws to couple the speaker and stand together to increase the mass of your set-up and further reduce resonance.

overviewFields.title: Accurate, on-axis output
overviewFields.value: Elevate and align your speakers with your ears so that you can enjoy a flawless on-axis sound and prevent reflection from nearby surfaces.

overviewFields.title: Safe and Secure
overviewFields.value: 2.5mm of silicone speaker dampening offers a high grip to keep your speakers and stand firmly in place. Mounting screws are included to help you further secure compatible speakers to the stand.

overviewFields.title: Reclaim your workspace
overviewFields.value: SE6’s clean, clutter-free design is built so that you can place extra items directly below the speakers, maximizing the utility of your desk surface and using the space normally taken up by traditional speakers.

overviewFields.title: Minimalist Design
overviewFields.value: Who says functional can’t be beautiful? The SE6 stand boasts a minimal design that matches the style and color of other Kanto accessories for a clean, consistent look. Available in a black or white finish.

name: PSB Alpha iQ Powered Streaming Speakers - Pair (Black)

specifications.title: Black Anodized Aluminum Dome with Ferrofluid and Neodymium Magnet
Wireless
specifications.value: BluOS, aptX™ HD Bluetooth (sink & source, 2-way source function is currently not supported)

overviewFields.title: A True All-in-One Audio System
overviewFields.value: The Alpha iQ sets a new benchmark for modern, tangle-free, audiophile-grade listening. The two speakers have 180W of built-in amplification and a network streamer based on the award-winning BluOS multi-room music platform. The left and right speakers communicate via a wireless link that can cover most rooms in an average-size home without delays or latency, so that music stays synched and clear regardless of speaker placement.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Built-in BluOS Network Streamer

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 4” Polypropylene Mid-Bass Driver

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 0.75” Aluminum Dome Tweeter

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Fully Active Design with DSP Crossover

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Dedicated Amplifiers for Each Driver

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: MQA Decoding & Rendering Capability

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: MM Phono, HDMI eARC, Optical, & Auxiliary Inputs

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Supports Airplay 2, Spotify Connect, & Tidal Connect

overviewFields.title: Small but Mighty
overviewFields.value: Available in 5 stunning Matte finishes, the Alpha iQ has a sleek, modern design. Inside each enclosure is a 4” polypropylene mid-bass driver with steel basket and rubber surround, and a 0.75” aluminum dome tweeter with neodymium magnet and ferrofluid damping. Each woofer has its own 60W class-D amplifier, and each tweeter its own 30W class-D amp, for a total system output of 180W.

overviewFields.title: DSP-Based Active Crossover
overviewFields.value: The Alpha iQ employs a DSP-based active crossover. Thanks to their powerful amplifiers, tuned bass ports, and DSP-enabled low-frequency extension, PSB’s Alpha iQ speakers can deliver bass output that completely belies their diminutive size. The Alpha iQ’s audiophile-grade DAC supports resolution to 24-bit/192kHz and has full MQA decoding and rendering capability for high-res streaming from Tidal.

overviewFields.title: Unlimited Music
overviewFields.value: Through the BluOS Controller app, you can play music from more than 20 streaming services including several that offer lossless and high-resolution audio, such as Amazon Music, Deezer, Idagio, Qobuz, and Tidal as well as internet radio stations from around the world. Apple Airplay 2, Spotify Connect and Tidal Connect are also supported. For listening options beyond streaming, a built-in MM preamp, RCA phono jacks and ground terminal allows you to connect a turntable. Other inputs include an HDMI eARC port for connecting to an HDTV, an optical input for connecting a disc player or game console, and a 3.5mm auxiliary input for connecting analog sources. The Alpha iQ also has Bluetooth connectivity, with support for the high-quality aptX-HD codec, for wireless playback from smart devices. You can connect an external drive loaded with music files to the Alpha iQ’s USB port and control playback.

overviewFields.title: Complete Control
overviewFields.value: Listeners can control every aspect of the Alpha iQ’s operation with the BluOS Controller app, which is available for Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows. Touch controls on the top of the primary speaker also provide immediate access for changing volume, pausing and resuming playback.

overviewFields.title: Integration
overviewFields.value: Like all BluOS-enabled components, the Alpha iQ can be integrated into popular smart home systems like Control4, Crestron, ELAN, RTI, and URC. Voice control is possible using Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple Siri (via AirPlay 2). IR learning is also available for listeners who use harmonized remotes that can operate multiple A/V components.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: ALPHAIQBLK

name: Advance Paris MyConnect 250 All-In-One Streamer, Amplifier, & CD Player

overviewFields.title: A Truly Universal Audiophile All-in-One!
overviewFields.value: The MyConnect range from Advance Paris is designed for the music lover who doesn't want to fill his living room with electronics.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Streamer, CD Player, & FM/DAB Tuner

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Tube Preamp

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Toroidal Transformer

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Phono Inputs (MM/MC)

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Wi-Fi & Ethernet Connections

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Compatible with Spotify Connect, Qobuz, Tidal, Deezer, Vtuner, & More

overviewFields.title: Connectivity
overviewFields.value: There's a lot to say about MyConnect 250's connectivity... From HDMI to Phono (MM/MC), analog RCA to AES-EBU, USB for computer to multiple optical and coaxial inputs, 3 speaker zones, network (Wi-Fi / Ethernet), and Bluetooth (optional with X-FTB01 / X-FTB02).  Of course, it cannot be a MyConnect product if it does not include a CD player and a FM/DAB tuner.

overviewFields.title: Outputs
overviewFields.value: Even the outputs are well handled, with balanced (XLR) and unbalanced (RCA) Pre-OUT connectors. And don't hesitate to connect 2 subwoofers if you wish, thanks to its two subwoofer outputs.

overviewFields.title: Power
overviewFields.value: Exceptional power and sound quality start with a good power supply. The MyConnect 250 will control any loudspeaker, thanks to its 2 toroidal transformers on either side of the product. You can choose any loudspeaker, from bookshelf to tall column.

overviewFields.title: Want To Spin a Record?
overviewFields.value: The MyConnect 250 is compatible with all read head technologies. You'll find settings for MM, low-level MC and high-level MC coils.

overviewFields.title: Spotify & More
overviewFields.value: MyConnect 250 is SPOTIFY Connect compatible. You can choose your amplifier as a music player directly in the SPOTIFY application.

overviewFields.title: Over-The-Air Radio
overviewFields.value: Find your FM (analog) and DAB (digital) radio stations thanks to the radio tuner included with MyConnect 250.

overviewFields.title: The Sound Magic of Audio Tubes
overviewFields.value: MyConnect 250 uses audio tubes for pre-amplification. A guarantee of great musicality, even for digital sources.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: MYCONNECT250

overviewFields.title: Combination of Convenience and Top-Notch Sound Quality
overviewFields.value: The RS520 is an advanced, high-performance integrated amplifier and network streamer combo packing the main functions of existing all-in-one streamers into a single component with a powerful output of 200 watts per channel.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Integrated amp with network audio and 4K video streamer

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 12.6" Touch Panel LCD Screen

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 200 watts x 2 into 8 ohms

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: ESS SABRE ES9038PRO DAC

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Native support for Apple Music, Rose Tube, Roon, Tidal, Spotify, Qobuz, YouTube, Apple Podcasts, Internet Radio, & 4K Video support

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Hi-Res Certified

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: MQA Full Decoder

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Upgradeable internal storage for locally stored files

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Run completely wireless or wired with gigabit ethernet

overviewFields.title: Solid Build Quality
overviewFields.value: The RS520's chassis is milled from a solid highly-durable aluminum block. This process creates an extremely rigid frame that significantly reduces noise-generating micro-vibrations that can degrade sound quality.

overviewFields.title: Connect With Your Audio
overviewFields.value: The RS520's 12.6-inch touchscreen does away with knobs and dials while HiFi Rose's native ROSE OS software creates a completely immersive interface letting you control your music with just the swipe of a finger. The front panel can display album art and music videos (capable of video playback at 60 fps) or custom VU meters.

overviewFields.title: Powerful, Cool, Quiet, and Efficient
overviewFields.value: Offering 200 watts per channel, the RS520 is all you need to build a true audiophile system. Utilizing the same GaN FET technology found in HiFi Rose's flagship RA180 amplifier "dead time" is dramatically reduced by one-third. To increase efficiency Power factor correction (PFC) is applied enabling the unit to respond to a wide range of input power, and to run cool, without noise or hum.

overviewFields.title: The Best Streaming Built-In
overviewFields.value: All your favorite streaming platforms are readily available via HiFi Rose's Rose Connect app with support for Apple Music, TIDAL, Qobuz, Bugs, Rose Tube, and internet radio stations. RS520 is Roon Ready with Spotify Connect, Airplay, Bluetooth A2DP, and DLNA support.

overviewFields.title: Watch Your Favorite Videos in Ultra HD 4K
overviewFields.value: Every HiFi Rose streamer goes beyond audio with a 4K capable HDMI output for video. Our custom RoseTube app delivers YouTube content with a custom interface that is optimized for music lovers. You’ll find curated music videos, concerts, and be able to connect to your own YouTube account. TIDAL subscribers also have access to a large library of iconic music videos as well as unique TIDAL video content. The VIDEO app provides access to your locally stored media, whether on the internal storage, or networked drive.

overviewFields.title: Internal Storage Options and Local Digital Music Libraries
overviewFields.value: Easily add a 2.5-inch SSD hard drive inside your HiFi Rose to store your local music collection. This also unlocks additional functionality, including the ability to cache your most played music on TIDAL and videos on RoseTube to maintain error-free playback even when your internet connection isn’t at 100%.

overviewFields.title: CD Playback & CD Ripping
overviewFields.value: With the RS201E, you can play and rip music on a CD by connecting our optional RSA-780 external CD drive via USB. You can extract the sound source from CDs as WAV or FLAC files and save them to SSD or USB.

overviewFields.title: Operate with Your Mobile Device or Remote Control
overviewFields.value: The Rose Connect remote control app completes the ultimate user experience letting allows users to conveniently control and manage HiFi Rose devices. The remote control app works on various platforms, including iPhone, iPad, Android phones, and PC. Additionally, you can control the device simply and easily using the provided Bluetooth remote control.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: CD drive for playback and ripping with HiFi Rose RS150B, RS250A, and RS201E network music players

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Connects to HiFi Rose players via included USB Type-A to Type-B cable

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Rips CDs to FLAC, FLAC (compressed) or WAV files*

overviewFields.title: Flawless Playback
overviewFields.value: HiFi Rose's team of engineers carefully devised an isolated, low-noise, anti-vibration design for the RSA-780, with high-performance insulators that minimize the noise that can occur when a CD is spinning.

overviewFields.title: Precision Conversion
overviewFields.value: Pairing the RSA-780 with a HiFi Rose streamer while using the Rose Connect app you can rip and organize your music collection in multiple formats, including FLAC and WAV.

overviewFields.title: Simple USB Connection
overviewFields.value: RSA-780 has a USB Type-B port for clean signal transfer; an RSA705 data cable is included (USB 2.0 A-B cable).

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: WWSRS5278B

overviewFields.title: Combination of Convenience and Top-Notch Sound Quality
overviewFields.value: The RS520 is an advanced, high-performance integrated amplifier and network streamer combo packing the main functions of existing all-in-one streamers into a single component with a powerful output of 200 watts per channel.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Integrated amp with network audio and 4K video streamer

overviewFields.title: Feature

overviewFields.title: Solid Build Quality
overviewFields.value: The RS520's chassis is milled from a solid highly-durable aluminum block. This process creates an extremely rigid frame that significantly reduces noise-generating micro-vibrations that can degrade sound quality.

overviewFields.title: Connect With Your Audio
overviewFields.value: The RS520's 12.6-inch touchscreen does away with knobs and dials while HiFi Rose's native ROSE OS software creates a completely immersive interface letting you control your music with just the swipe of a finger. The front panel can display album art and music videos (capable of video playback at 60 fps) or custom VU meters.

overviewFields.title: Powerful, Cool, Quiet, and Efficient
overviewFields.value: Offering 200 watts per channel, the RS520 is all you need to build a true audiophile system. Utilizing the same GaN FET technology found in HiFi Rose's flagship RA180 amplifier "dead time" is dramatically reduced by one-third. To increase efficiency Power factor correction (PFC) is applied enabling the unit to respond to a wide range of input power, and to run cool, without noise or hum.

overviewFields.title: The Best Streaming Built-In
overviewFields.value: All your favorite streaming platforms are readily available via HiFi Rose's Rose Connect app with support for Apple Music, TIDAL, Qobuz, Bugs, Rose Tube, and internet radio stations. RS520 is Roon Ready with Spotify Connect, Airplay, Bluetooth A2DP, and DLNA support.

overviewFields.title: Watch Your Favorite Videos in Ultra HD 4K
overviewFields.value: Every HiFi Rose streamer goes beyond audio with a 4K capable HDMI output for video. Our custom RoseTube app delivers YouTube content with a custom interface that is optimized for music lovers. You’ll find curated music videos, concerts, and be able to connect to your own YouTube account. TIDAL subscribers also have access to a large library of iconic music videos as well as unique TIDAL video content. The VIDEO app provides access to your locally stored media, whether on the internal storage, or networked drive.

overviewFields.title: Internal Storage Options and Local Digital Music Libraries
overviewFields.value: Easily add a 2.5-inch SSD hard drive inside your HiFi Rose to store your local music collection. This also unlocks additional functionality, including the ability to cache your most played music on TIDAL and videos on RoseTube to maintain error-free playback even when your internet connection isn’t at 100%.

overviewFields.title: CD Playback & CD Ripping
overviewFields.value: With the RS201E, you can play and rip music on a CD by connecting our optional RSA-780 external CD drive via USB. You can extract the sound source from CDs as WAV or FLAC files and save them to SSD or USB.

overviewFields.title: Operate with Your Mobile Device or Remote Control
overviewFields.value: The Rose Connect remote control app completes the ultimate user experience letting allows users to conveniently control and manage HiFi Rose devices. The remote control app works on various platforms, including iPhone, iPad, Android phones, and PC. Additionally, you can control the device simply and easily using the provided Bluetooth remote control.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: CD drive for playback and ripping with HiFi Rose RS150B, RS250A, and RS201E network music players

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Connects to HiFi Rose players via included USB Type-A to Type-B cable

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Rips CDs to FLAC, FLAC (compressed) or WAV files*

overviewFields.title: Flawless Playback
overviewFields.value: HiFi Rose's team of engineers carefully devised an isolated, low-noise, anti-vibration design for the RSA-780, with high-performance insulators that minimize the noise that can occur when a CD is spinning.

overviewFields.title: Precision Conversion
overviewFields.value: Pairing the RSA-780 with a HiFi Rose streamer while using the Rose Connect app you can rip and organize your music collection in multiple formats, including FLAC and WAV.

overviewFields.title: Simple USB Connection
overviewFields.value: RSA-780 has a USB Type-B port for clean signal transfer; an RSA705 data cable is included (USB 2.0 A-B cable).
